articles.title: Consumption Of Financial Services By Women Low Despite High Awareness, Says Study - News18
articles.description: Around 78% of women surveyed cited cash withdrawal as the primary reason for visiting a retail store for financial transactions.
articles.content:
Awareness about financial services such as insurance among women, and especially those in the 18-35 age bracket, grew to 29% in 2022 but consumption is still below 1 %, a new study said.
